title: "Save a copy of a report &amp; Collapse navigation pane in Organizational App"
excerpt: "We are thrilled to announce that based on your feedback, we have decided to bring back the feature that allowed app consumers to save copies of reports to their My Workspace. Further, app authors can now by default collapse the app navigation pane for their app consumer."
